summary:
*Spider-Man* is a popular superhero movie from 2002. It tells the story of Peter Parker, a shy teen who gets superpowers after a spider bite. He becomes Spider-Man, fighting crime in New York. The film stars Tobey Maguire and was directed by Sam Raimi.

Making the movie took a long time, with many changes in plans. It was a big hit, making lots of money and getting good reviews. It helped make superhero movies more popular and led to two sequels.
title: Spider-Man (2002 film)
